sentence: He ran for a seat in the National Assembly of Quebec in the Montreal-based district of Mercier against Daniel Turp of the Parti Québécois in the 2003 Quebec general election, 2007 Quebec general election and 2008 Quebec general election elections.

examples.sentence: ...which merged with the progressive conservative party of canada in 2003 to form...
